intro.interest: This application is a part of a task for Olecons. Hello, I am Rohit Mirchandani and I am writing to express my strong interest in the Frontend Developer position in your company. As a recent graduate with a solid foundation in the MERN stack and a strong passion for web development, I am excited about the opportunity to contribute my skills and enthusiasm to your dynamic team.

My proficiency in the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) stack has allowed me to develop robust and scalable web solutions. I have a deep understanding of modern web development practices, including the use of RESTful APIs, state management, and component-based architecture, which I have applied to create around 15-20 frontend and full-stack projects. These projects have not only honed my technical skills but have also instilled in me the importance of delivering exceptional user experiences.
intro.tools: In addition to my technical skills, I am well-versed in essential tools and practices for collaborative software development. I am proficient in using Git and GitHub for version control and have experience working in a Linux environment. My ability to work within a team and adhere to best coding practices makes me an ideal candidate for your company.
intro.problemSolving: One aspect of my profile that I am particularly proud of is my dedication to honing my problem-solving skills. I am consistently ranked in the top 4% of programmers on LeetCode and have actively participated in over 100 competitive programming competitions. Through these experiences, I have successfully solved more than 1000 algorithmic problems in Java. This background has equipped me with strong analytical and critical thinking abilities that I believe will be valuable in solving complex challenges in a professional setting.
intro.internship: During my internship at Persistent Systems, I had the opportunity to work on real-world projects and collaborate with experienced developers. This experience provided me with insights into the software development lifecycle, project management, and the importance of effective communication within a team.
intro.traits: I am highly motivated, a quick learner, and enthusiastic about staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies. I am confident that my passion for web development, practical experience, and problem-solving abilities make me a strong fit for your Company.
intro.conclusion: Thank you for considering my application. I am eager to discuss how my skills and background align with the needs of your company in more detail. I look forward to the opportunity to interview with your team.

internship.title: Internship : Persistent Systems
internship.description: During my Martian Internship at Persistent Systems, which took place from July 2022 to August 2022, I underwent comprehensive training in various fundamental computer science concepts. These concepts encompassed a wide range of topics, including Computer Networks, Data Structures, Algorithms, Operating Systems, Database Management, and Object-Oriented Programming (OOPS). This training equipped me with a solid foundation in these critical areas, enhancing my knowledge and skills in the field of computer science.

captionizer.title: Captionizer
captionizer.description: In the project titled 'Captionizer,' conducted from May 2022 to July 2022, I developed an innovative solution aimed at simplifying the process of creating captions for social media posts. This AI-driven system generates relevant and engaging captions, effectively saving users valuable time that would otherwise be spent on manual internet browsing. To accomplish this, I implemented an algorithm utilizing the ImageAI module in conjunction with TinyYOLOv4 and the Natural Language Toolkit (NLTK). Additionally, I created a Flask API to support the backend functionality and designed a user-friendly React frontend for seamless interaction with the system.

multiplayergame.title: Multiplayer Game
multiplayergame.description: My involvement in the 'Multiplayer Game' project, conducted from July 2021 to September 2021, allowed me to demonstrate my proficiency in developing captivating and interactive online experiences. Specifically, I designed and built a real-time multiplayer web game based on the classic game of rock-paper-scissors. Leveraging technologies such as React and Node.js with Socket.io for real-time communication, I ensured that players could engage in live, animated gameplay experiences. The game is mobile responsive and hosted on the Heroku platform, enabling a broad audience to enjoy the gaming experience.

carrentalpagefreelancing.title: Car Rental Page Freelancing
carrentalpagefreelancing.description: In October 2022, I undertook a freelancing project focused on enhancing the online presence of a car rental shop. For this project, I developed a mobile-responsive web page designed to capture the attention of potential customers. The webpage boasts a user-friendly interface, making it easy for visitors to explore the car rental options. Additionally, I integrated a customer inquiry form to facilitate inquiries and bookings, further enhancing the shop's customer engagement and overall digital experience.
